name: Avocado, Mango, and Pineapple Smoothie
description: Summer's the time to break out the blender for morning smoothies—the weather's hot and the fruit is ripe. Get out of your berry-and-yogurt rut with this ultra-creamy smoothie using a usually-savory ingredient: avocado.
recipeIngredient: 1 ripe medium avocado, pitted, peeled and diced (about 1 cup)

recipeInstructions.text: Add coconut water, avocado, mango, pineapple, ice, and agave nectar to blender. Blend on high until completely smooth, about 30 seconds. Divide between two glasses and serve immediately.
